Service Details: - Acts as the central access point for complaints that are not addressed at the service delivery level- Provides a clear, consistent, timely and transparent process for patients to register complaints about the care they receive from Interior Health- Complaints will be dealt with promptly and fairly- Our office will formally register their complaint, work with them to identify a reasonable resolution to their concern, provide them with a response to their complaint and an explanation about any decisions and actions taken as a result of the complaint
